scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:electron && npx electron-builder install-app-deps
scripts.start: npm run postinstall:electron && npm-run-all -p ng:serve electron:serve
scripts.build: npm run postinstall:electron && npm run electron:serve-tsc && ng build
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on http-get://localhost:4200/ && npm run electron:serve-tsc && electron . --serve
scripts.electron:linux: npm run build:prod && npx electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:windows: npm run build:prod && npx electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:mac: npm run build:prod && npx electron-builder build --mac
